name: Vanessa
text: My order is always correct and their delivery time is speedy considering the fact that my location is difficult to find.

name: Severia Nichole
text: I love this location.. staff are always friendly and the food is so much better than others. In my opinion 😊

name: UNAPOLOGETICALLY AVIS
text: Food always fresh and tasty.  The employees are always helpful with suggestions and what's current. -Avis

name: Melissa Lowe
text: Use to be my favorite place to go! No any more!Called my order in 25 minutes till I picked up on way to work when I got there and went in the two guys working totally ignored me there was no other customers after ten minutes and them both seeing me I left! Extremely rude I’ll miss the food and use to be good service!

name: Jack Chen
text: Asked for a steak cheese and mushroom calzone thing. Look at what I got a mushroom melt that ended up in the trash. Gross

name: Nancy G
text: I don’t know what’s worse- The customer service or the delivery. The employees have no people skills. They are rude and unprofessional. The delivery driver takes forever to bring the food. Seems like a bunch of lifeless robots working there.

name: Emily Jackson
text: Waited 10 minutes in the restaurant for an order that I could see ready and sitting on the rack. Already paid for. None of the staff had a sec to speak to me or hand the pizza from the rack to the front counter. …More

name: Chris L
text: If u want pizza riding around town in the back seat of a cold car from a 3rd party delivery system be my guest !

name: Bradley Waldron
text: C'mon, it's Howie's!  Where else are you going to get flavored crust?  And you know you'll be hitting this place up at the end of the month 'cause they're so cheap.  And you know what, even tho they're cheap, they still care about you …More

name: Don Coker
text: Good cheap pizza.

name: tamiwat
text: I basically chose this pizza place because I enjoy the salads. The salads are always delicious. However, I should've left it at that. Wings are always SO salty--even unsauced. A frozen pizza probably would've tasted better than the pizza I ordered.

name: Beth Smith
text: Awesome customer service!

name: Gaming Index
text: I love this pizza! Fast service.

name: Kimberly Gaskin
text: We order from this location quite frequently because there are many options out where we live. Yesterday I had one of the worst customer service experiences with my order. I used the app to order food (done before), more than 2 and a half …More

name: Jamila Lewis
text: Always fresh. Love the Cinnamon sugar crust when they remember to put it on the crust

name: Jay Jubran
text: The worst ever I ordered from there a few weeks ago for deliver they showed up 2 hours later with a cold pizza today I order a pick up stuffed crust pizza I pick it up the forget to put cheese in the crust I called the 2 managers said that …More

name: Esther Weiner
text: Mostly take out.  Located in shopping center, so lots of parking.  Just a counter and a few stools but pizza hot and tasty.

name: Toby Chapman
text: I try to eat their pizza at least once per week. They have good specials and I really like the selection option of crusts. Try the sesame seed crust. It is great

name: Mr.Mourdeep Smokey
text: Better off getting a strange unkept person to throw some cheese on bread

name: Golden Child
text: Under cook wings almost raw

name: Russell Mitchell
text: Great food, drinks, service and atmosphere.  Love this place!

name: Rod Chris
text: I Love this Store. They always get my order right! cajun crust is awsome

name: Todd Terry
text: I eat here all the time they are always prompt and courteous. Don't forget to ask for the wacky Wednesday deal.

name: Jaxon's City
text: Always good cheap pizza. Well when it's hot

name: V. Solutions
text: Trash staff.  Pure incompetence.  Wants me to pay for their errors...

name: Eric Nichols
text: I personaly don't care for their pizza, but many do. College kids and young adults both seem to like it.

name: Chris j
text: I usually love going to hungry howies because the pizza is delicious. However, my experience at this specific location was not that great. One of the girls who works there was very rude to me. She gave me an attitude when I came to pick up …More

name: patrick johnson
text: Great food fast service

name: Michael Mercier
text: Pizza was very well made, staff was awesome. never a bad experience at this location.

name: Belinda Ann Crews
text: Great place to order from when you need anything delivered.  Personnel have been courteous and professional.

name: Chris Parker
text: Five stars because of kindness.  I was volunteering at a pet adoption event for CAUZICAN  foster dogs and when they filled our order for medium pizzas (eight of them) they gave us large pizzas at no extra cost when they heard what we were about...even threw in a free litre of Pepsi...thanks, guys.

name: Daniel Meyer
text: Hungry Howie's gets a high score for their value. It's decent tasting pizza at an inexpensive price and is typically a crowd-pleaser. And flavored crust FTW! Cajun all the way!

name: Constance Pierrebarfield
text: Need to learn to wash hands I had to tell the guy he bout to touch my food after touching $

name: Debra Horton
text: Chicken wings were tender, yet salty. The bread included in the order was tough. Greek salad was mediocre.

name: Darren Lee
text: Great classic flavored crust.

name: Jennifer Tyler
text: Called to order pizza & salad for 4 people, including my 95 yr old parents. This was a treat for us since we live in the country, 35 mins from this store (so no delivery). Ordered one large cheese pizza, with  EXTRA cheese, and lg antipasto …More

name: Curtis Adair
text: Good food for the price

name: Karen Boatright
text: Ordered pizza and spaghetti at 12:04pm. Called them back several times. Pizza delivered just after 2:00pm. They told me there would not be a charge.  We will see.

text: Excellent customer service and food

name: Mark Smith

name: Jennifer Fountain
text: Could do better with the flavored crust and appearance

name: Ria Somers
text: Service was good. My disappointment was pizza sauce on spaghetti? And way too much. Why do you break the pasta into baby size? Bake the bread another 10 minutes.

name: Kenny Matos
text: Delivery to thonotosassa...Great driver, pizza was good but too much sauce.

name: Joseph Bullington
text: Front desk rep was very friendly, but pizza was not good, salad was marginal and pizza set on rack until was lukewarm before even calling our name.

name: Ken Hale
text: Pretty good pizza

name: Carl Moore
text: Good priced pizza and crust flavors make Pizza Hut seem silly.

name: scott kennedy
text: The only one in Tallahassee that has good pizzas I mean only. Go to any other  Pizza place and the food is not as good whether  the name is the same or not.

name: Ziri N Que
text: I go to this place all the time is it a great place to go everyone is helpful and so nice.

name: brian harris
text: Waited around for an hour waiting on a delivery after my card was charged, wasn't able to even speak to a manager. When I called they said no one was even out delivering it. This place blows and I can't even get my money back (which I have very little of) for another 5-7 days. Thanks hungry Howies

name: Nikki Tricky
text: The employees were friendly and the food came out quickly. Plus, the cheese bread was really yummy.

name: MH Tally
text: Horrible.  The employees are rude and the service is terrible. Don't go here the other hungry howies in town are better.  There is one down the road on appalachee pkwy just go there
